meanings.definition: Relating to or consisting of coprolites.
meanings.sent1: The coprolitic sample was analyzed by the scientist.
meanings.sent2: The museum displayed various coprolitic specimens.
meanings.sent3: The coprolitic rock looked like a fossilized poop!
meanings.sent4: The coprolitic texture of the stone was intriguing.
meanings.sent5: The coprolitic nature of the artifact fascinated the archaeologists.

meanings.sent1: The coprolitic appearance of the fossil puzzled the researchers.
meanings.sent2: The coprolitic smell emanating from the cave was overwhelming.
meanings.sent3: The coprolitic design on the ancient pottery was unexpected.
meanings.sent4: Her coprolitic sense of humor always brought laughter.
meanings.sent5: The coprolitic markings on the wall told a story of the past.
